title: Can't find references (xref) to function
content:
I am reversing a function and when I trying to see its references, it doesn't show me the calls to the function. It only show the place of the object in RVA.

Is there a plug-in or something that I can find all the call to this function?

answers_data.content:
Could it be an indirect call to the function? Like described here
One of the suggestions is to search for cross-references to that data area you found. For example off_.... looks suspicious.
